00042     class _OgreExport FileSystemArchive : public Archive 
00043     {
00044     protected:
00055         void findFiles(const String& pattern, bool recursive, bool dirs,
00056             StringVector* simpleList, FileInfoList* detailList);
00057 
00058     public:
00059         FileSystemArchive(const String& name, const String& archType );
00060         ~FileSystemArchive();
00061 
00063         bool isCaseSensitive(void) const;
00064 
00066         void load();
00068         void unload();
00069 
00071         DataStreamPtr open(const String& filename) const;

00075 
00077         FileInfoListPtr listFileInfo(bool recursive = true, bool dirs = false);
00078

00081             bool dirs = false);
00082 
00084         FileInfoListPtr findFileInfo(const String& pattern, bool recursive = true,
00085             bool dirs = false);
00086

00089

00092 
00096         static void setIgnoreHidden(bool ignore)
00097         {
00098             ms_IgnoreHidden = ignore;
00099         }
00100 
00102         static bool getIgnoreHidden()
00103         {
00104             return ms_IgnoreHidden;
00105         }
00106

00108     };

00111     //class _OgrePrivate FileSystemArchiveFactory : public ArchiveFactory
00112     class _OgreExport FileSystemArchiveFactory : public ArchiveFactory
00113     {
00114     public:
00115         virtual ~FileSystemArchiveFactory() {}
00117         const String& getType(void) const;
00119         Archive *createInstance( const String& name ) 
00120         {
00121             return OGRE_NEW FileSystemArchive(name, "FileSystem");
00122         }
00124         void destroyInstance( Archive* arch) { delete arch; }
00125     };
